thread.title: FCA US Statement Regarding UAW Strike Notification
thread.title_full: FCA US Statement Regarding UAW Strike Notification - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: FCA US Statement Regarding UAW Strike Notification
text:
FCA US LLC
AUBURN HILLS, Mich. , Oct. 6, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- FCA US confirms that it has received strike notification from the UAW. The Company continues to work with the UAW in a constructive manner to reach a new agreement.
